short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin is designed to aid in synchronizing member data from ChurchOfJesusChrist.org data to the EMR PREP application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin is designed to aid in synchronizing member data from ChurchOfJesusChrist.org data to the EMR PREP application.  You must have an account for both sites in order to use this plugin.  Please contact support at https://emrprep.com for any issues.
